security.csp: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://avatars.githubusercontent.com https://github.com data:; connect-src 'self' https://api.github.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'

bundle.shortDescription: Generate polished social cards for GitHub repos
bundle.longDescription: RepoCard Studio is a free, developer-first utility that helps you promote your GitHub repositories by generating polished, ready-to-share social cards, README snippets, release notes, and press kits.
